name: Bullet Time (itch) (Tuluk)
description:
Made for NOKIA  3310 JAM 5

----------------------------------------

Collect  the shinies. Dodge the onslaught of bullets with the help of slow motion. However, the slow motion is only active while you are moving.

Controls-

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Interact w/ menu 

For some reason, high-score tracker isn't working.
